definition: drive letter (letter assigned to a disk drive or partition) (computing)

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: 'X' in the following examples represents your drive letter, for example, G.
sentences.chinese: 在以後的例子裏，X代表你的盤符，例如G盤。

sentences.english: USERNAME: Lists the name of the user currently logged on.
sentences.chinese: 列出與用戶主目錄所在的驅動器盤符。

sentences.english: specifies the Drive letter and folder path to subdirectories
sentences.chinese: 指定子目錄的驅動器盤符和文件夾路徑。

sentences.english: A new disc with its own letter will appear in the drives list.
sentences.chinese: 擁有特定盤符的新盤將被顯示在驅動器列表中。

sentences.english: Select the letter of the floppy disk drive, and then click Back Up .
sentences.chinese: 請選擇軟盤驅動器盤符，然後單擊“備份”。

sentences.english: Insert the computer, can show that the mobile disk drive and a text file.
sentences.chinese: 插入電腦後，可顯示移動磁盤盤符及一個文本文件。
